about_the_game:
Forklift Certified

GET READY TO BE CERTIFIED!

ABOUT THIS GAME Welcome to Forklift Certified, a unique single-player 3D top-down puzzle experience where you can kick back, unwind, and enjoy clever challenges at your own pace. Take control of a forklift to navigate intricate puzzles, activate mechanisms, and conquer challenges in 4 handcrafted levels included in the demo, each set in a distinct and creative environment.

FEATURES

🚜 Engaging Forklift-Based Gameplay

  • Use your forklift to interact with the environment: activate buttons, flip switches, and deliver puzzle pieces to their correct locations.

🧩 4 Handcrafted Levels Across Unique Locations

  • Solve puzzles in diverse environments, from an industrial trainyard to the scenic docks, through a mysterious dungeon, and more!

📄 Find the Certification Manual Pages

  • Every level features a hidden certification manual page waiting to be discovered.

🎖️ Certifications

  • Track your progress and with certifications.

🎵 Immersive Audio & Visuals

  • Enjoy cel-shaded graphics and a dynamic soundtrack that create a calming and engaging atmosphere.

COMING SOON TO FORKLIFT CERTIFIED (FULL GAME):

  • Additional Levels: Explore six more handcrafted levels with new challenges.

  • Game Modes: Experience Time Trial, Fuel Mode, and Limited Pickup Mode.

  • Custom Skins: Personalize your forklift with quirky designs.

  • Certifications: Even more certifications will be available in the full game to challenge your skills.
